text.section:
The provisions of §§ 7-256 through 7-268 of this title shall be used and shall apply to enforce violations of:
This subtitle; or
Any regulation adopted under this subtitle.

Any action taken by the Department under this subtitle at a site under active enforcement may not:
Negate the terms and conditions of any outstanding active enforcement order, decree, judgment, permit, or other document that addresses environmental contamination at the site; or
Relieve any person who is the subject of an active enforcement action from liability for penalties under the enforcement action.
